title: Four Horsemen of Meaning: Jordan Peterson, John Vervaeke, Bishop Barron & Jonathan Pageau
description:
For the past 3 years I have focussed my work on long form conversations with theologians, scientists, authors, and artists, as well as thoroughly prepared lectures on the intersection of theology & meaning-making via my podcast "Deep Talks: Exploring Theology & Meaning-Making".

I'm experimenting today with a bit of an "off the cuff", theological reaction video to the recent conversation released on @Jordan B Peterson channel with @John Vervaeke @Bishop Robert Barron & @Jonathan Pageau . This is part 1. We'll see how many of these I do. I welcome your engagement.

Here's a video of my first conversation with John Vervaeke:
https://youtu.be/7xX7DWZjmFc

And a video of my second conversation with him:
https://youtu.be/RUWK1WJZH_w

If you are interested in my 3 part lecture series entitled "Jesus and John Vervaeke" start here:
https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-p9pth-10acee7
